articles.title: Asia shares slip as U.S. jobs stunner hammers bonds - Reuters
articles.description: Asian share markets mostly eased on Monday after stunningly strong U.S. jobs data soothed concerns about the global economy but also added to the risk of an aggressive tightening by the Federal Reserve.
